title: Nomad Counter - Track Your Global Adventures

hero.title: Calculate Your Days!
hero.actionRight: Download the App and Chart Your Journey

counting.title: Explore Your Travel History and Tally Up Every Day
counting.subtitle: Counting Your Days
counting.description: Discover how many days you've spent in each country with Nomad Counter, a simple application to keep a detailed record of your adventures. Organize your travel history and easily track the duration of your stays in different destinations.
counting.need: Click here to log in first
